root: ^Who is it, so early in the morning?
^Good morning, Detective. I am Phillip Anderson, assistant to Mr. Jenkins. I'm afraid I bring dreadful news.
^Come in, Mr. Anderson. What seems to be the problem?
^It's Mr. Jenkins, Detective. He...he's dead. Poisoned, it seems.
^Yes, Detective. The ship's doctor believes so. He had his dinner last night and then... he never woke up.
^That's most unfortunate. Did the doctor ascertain the type of poison?
^Not yet. But the Captain, in his wisdom, has locked up Chef Sullivan under suspicion of poisoning Mr. Jenkins' food.
^That's a severe accusation. Was there any evidence pointing towards him?
^None that I know of, but the Captain seems convinced that the poison came from the kitchen.
^I see, that complicates things. I need to speak with the Captain, and I must see this Chef Sullivan. Thank you for bringing this to my attention, Mr. Anderson.
